com.dropoutdesign.ddf
Class RemoteFloor

java.lang.Object
  com.dropoutdesign.ddf.DanceFloor
      com.dropoutdesign.ddf.RemoteFloor

public class RemoteFloor
extends DanceFloor

Allows inspection and control of a Dance Floor published over the network by a DDF Server.

Field Summary
static int DEFAULT_PORT
          Default port on which to connect the DDF Server.

Constructor Detail

RemoteFloor

public RemoteFloor(java.lang.String serverAddress)
Create a new Remote Floor, corresponding to the supplied network address. The address can be specified in host:port format, or else the default port will be used.
